Name: nep-ahlalhadithcent-la
Author: Ahl Al Hadith Central Society Of Nepal

Translations.Text: Sura gardachu allahako namabata jo atyanta dayalu ra ati krpalu cha
Samasta prasansa allahakai lagi chan, jo sampurna brahmandako palanakarta ho
Hami timrai upasana gardachaum ra timisanga matra maddata cahanchaum
Uniharuko bato jasala'i timile puraskrta garyau tiniharuko ho'ina jasamathi timro krodha bhayo, ra na pathabhrastaharuko (bato)
